## R Markdown


```{r}


Hops_oil_and_acid_every=read.csv("Hops oil and acid -every.csv")
HOD=as.data.frame(Hops_oil_and_acid_every)
rownames(HOD) <- HOD$Variety
HOD=HOD[-1]
HOD.no_other=HOD[-8]

summary(HOD)

```

## Including Plots


```{r}
df <- scale(HOD.no_other)

pairs(df)
```

```{r}
library(factoextra)

res.pca=prcomp(df)
fviz_eig(res.pca)
fviz_pca_ind(res.pca,label="ind",repel = TRUE)
```
